definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: break through (NH id.; J Aram. [[פְּרַץ]] id.; perh. As. parâṣu (v.Dl:HWB); Ar. faras.a cut, slit, also hit);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3ms. [[פָּרַץ]] 2Sa 5:20 +; 2 ms. sf. [[פְּרַחְתָּנוּ]] Ps 60:3, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִפְרׂץ]] Ex 1:12, Ex 19:22, [[יִרְְָץ־]] v:Ex 19:24, [[זַיִּפְרׂץ]] Ge 30:30 +, etc.; Inf. abs. [[פָּטׂץ]] Is 5:5; cstr. [[פְּרׂץ]] 2Ch 31:5, [[פְּרוׁץ]] Ec 3:3; Pt. act. [[פּׂרֵץ]] Mic 2:13, Ec 10:8; pass. fs. [[פָּרוּחָה]] 2Ch 32:5, Pr 25:28; mpl. [[פְּרֻחִים]] Ne 4:1 + [[הֵם]] [[פָּרוּחִים]] Ne 2:13 Qr (> Kt [[המפרוחים]] );—break through:
break or nurst out, from womb Ge 38:29 (J; c. acc. cogn.); from enclosure Mic 2:13.

break through, down (from without), c. acc. [[גָּדֵר]] Is 5:5, Ps 80:13, Ps 89:41, Ec 10:8; [[חוֹמָה]] Ne 3:35, 2Ch 26:6, cf. pt. pass. Ne 2:13, 2Ch 32:5; c. [[בְּחוֹמָה]] = make a breach in 2Ki 14:13 = 2Ch 25:23; [[עִיר פְּרוּחָה]] Pr 25:28; abs., opp. [[בָּנָה]] Ec 3:3; [[הַפּׂרֵץ]] Mic 2:13; [[הַפְּרוּחִים]] Ne 4:1 the part broken down.
break open, a mining shaft Job 28:4.
break up, break in pieces, c.acc. [[מַעֲשֶׂיְ]] 2Ch 20:37 (‖ [[יַוּשָּֽׁבְרוּ אֳנִיּוֹת]]).

break put (violently) upon, of ´[[י]] in sudden judgment, c. acc. pers. 2Sa 5:20 = 1Ch 14:11, Ps 60:3; c, [[ב]] pers. Ex 19:22 Ex 19:24 (J), 1Ch 15:13, so of plague Ps 106:29; of ´[[י]], c. acc. cogn. [[פֶּרֶין]] + [[ב]] pers. 2Sa 6:8 = 1Ch 13:11; c. acc. cogn. + sf. Job 16:14.
break over [limits], increase, [[וַיִפְרׂץ לָרׂב]] Ge 30:30 (J), 1Ch 4:38; + [[ה]] loc. Ge 28:14 (J); abs. Ge 30:43 (J), Ex 1:12 (J; + [[רָבָה]]), Ho 4:10, Is 54:3, [[פָּרַץ בָּאָרֶץ]] Job 1:10.
burst open, intrans., of wine-vats Pr 3:10 (c. acc. mat. [[תִּירוֹשׁ]]).

spread, i.e. become known, of [[הַדָּבָר]] 2Ch 31:5.—1Ch 13:2 is prob. corrupt, v. Kau, who (after SS) conj. [[נֶחֱרָחָה]]; ´[[פ]] in 2Ch 11:23 is appar. distribute (c. [[מִן]] partit.) but dubious.—1Sa 28:23, 2Sa 13:25, 2Sa 13:27, 2Ki 5:23 v. [[פחר]].

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[אֵין חָזוֹן נִפְרָָץ]] 1Sa 3:1 no vision spread abroad (i.e. general, or frequent, cf.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[הַמִּתְפָּֽרְחִים]] 1Sa 25:10 slaves who break away, each from ([[מִפְּנֵי]]) his master.
